name: choo
description: A 5kb framework for creating sturdy frontend applications

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:dev && npm run build:min && npm run build:gz
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:dev:choo && npm run build:dev:html
scripts.build:dev:choo: NODE_ENV=development browserify index.js --standalone=choo -t envify -g yo-yoify -g es2020 > dist/choo.js
scripts.build:min: npm run build:min:choo && npm run build:min:html
scripts.build:min:choo: NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js --standalone=choo -t envify -g unassertify -g yo-yoify -g es2020 -g uglifyify -t envify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs > dist/choo.min.js
scripts.build:gz: npm run build:gz:choo && npm run build:gz:html
scripts.instrument:discify: browserify index.js --full-paths -g unassertify -g yo-yoify -g es2020 -g uglifyify | uglifyjs | discify --open
scripts.instrument:gzip: mkdir -p tmp/ browserify index.js -g unassertify -g yo-yoify -g es2020 -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs | zopfli -i1000 -c -- | wc -c | pretty-bytes
scripts.instrument:minified: browserify index.js -g unassertify -g yo-yoify -g es2020 -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs | wc -c | pretty-bytes
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:dev && npm run build:min
scripts.preversion: if [ ! -z $SKIP_TEST ]; then npm run test:browser; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:lint npm run test:cov && npm run test:server
scripts.test:cov: browserify tests/**/*.js -p proxyquire-universal -p tape-istanbul/plugin | tape-run | tape-istanbul && istanbul report
